Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

We are pleased to offer our renewal terms based on proposal form submitted, noting the following:

 

*	Happy to inform you we have successfully negotiated a reduction in the annual premium and our best offer is AED 184,000 + 5% VAT.

 

*	Additionally, we have negotiated an alternative option 2 with increased policy sum insured to AED 3,700,000 each and every loss and in the aggregate and for this option insurers will require an annual premium of AED 233,000 + 5% VAT.   Please note retroactive date will be from inception in respect of any increased limits.

chunks.text:
*	Additionally, we have negotiated an alternative option 2 with increased policy sum insured to AED 3,700,000 each and every loss and in the aggregate and for this option insurers will require an annual premium of AED 233,000 + 5% VAT.   Please note retroactive date will be from inception in respect of any increased limits. 

 

*	We have also persuaded Reinsurers to include a 5% Long Term Agreement Discount which means provided this policy is maintained through insurers/Nasco for three whole years commencing inception hereon, the Insured is able to reduce the renewal premium by 5% hereon. For the sake of good order, if for any reason the Long-Term Agreement is not maintained for the full three-year period, any allowed discount will be returnable to insurers.

 

*	Provided there are no known or reported losses in the remainder of the policy period and provided the renewal is obtained with insurers hereon, the Insured is eligible to collect their No Claims Bonus.  This is calculated at 10% of the expiring premium, and this amount can be deducted from the renewal premium when making payment. 

 

Please note the subjectivities in quotation are due to insurers prior to binding. 

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

 



 

Nasco Gulf

P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE

T +971 4 351 8610 D +971 4 305 1835 F +971 4 351 8710

Dear Hagop,

 

Good Morning , hope you are doing well !

 

As part of our constant efforts to improve the scope of policy, we advise that you should have impersonation fraud extension in your policy.

 

This is also called executive impersonation, attackers impersonate an executive–typically a CFO or CEO or even vendors and request a fraudulently payment / sensitive data. 

 

Kindly fill in attached questionnaire and share with us enabling us to take this up with cover holders.

 

Reinsurers may be able to offer this coverage subject to a satisfactorily completed application form. This coverage is usually sub-limited and with an additional premium.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

Dear Uttam,

 

Thank you for your email and your continued effort.

 

We would like to proceed with the renewal based on Option 1, provided the expiring terms are maintained.

 

Appreciate if you would reinstate the 10% No Claims Bonus and remove the proposed replacement of the 5% Long Term Agreement Discount.

 

We are happy to proceed with the expiring premium without the proposed discount. However, I prefer retaining the 10% NCB over the 5% LTA discount.

 

Please proceed with binding cover based on the expiring headcount, assuming you can secure support for the renewal under the expiring terms.

 

Thank you for your support.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

We are pleased to offer our renewal terms based on proposal form submitted, noting the following:

 

*	Happy to inform you we have successfully negotiated a reduction in the annual premium and our best offer is AED 184,000 + 5% VAT.

 

*	Additionally, we have negotiated an alternative option 2 with increased policy sum insured to AED 3,700,000 each and every loss and in the aggregate and for this option insurers will require an annual premium of AED 233,000 + 5% VAT.   Please note retroactive date will be from inception in respect of any increased limits. 

 

*	We have also persuaded Reinsurers to include a 5% Long Term Agreement Discount which means provided this policy is maintained through insurers/Nasco for three whole years commencing inception hereon, the Insured is able to reduce the renewal premium by 5% hereon. For the sake of good order, if for any reason the Long-Term Agreement is not maintained for the full three-year period, any allowed discount will be returnable to insurers.

*	Provided there are no known or reported losses in the remainder of the policy period and provided the renewal is obtained with insurers hereon, the Insured is eligible to collect their No Claims Bonus.  This is calculated at 10% of the expiring premium, and this amount can be deducted from the renewal premium when making payment. 

 

Please note the subjectivities in quotation are due to insurers prior to binding. 

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

As part of our constant efforts to improve the scope of policy, we advise that you should have impersonation fraud extension in your policy.

 

This is also called executive impersonation, attackers impersonate an executive–typically a CFO or CEO or even vendors and request a fraudulently payment / sensitive data. 

 

Kindly fill in attached questionnaire and share with us enabling us to take this up with cover holders.

 

Reinsurers may be able to offer this coverage subject to a satisfactorily completed application form. This coverage is usually sub-limited and with an additional premium.

تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

We are pleased to offer our renewal terms based on proposal form submitted, noting the following:

 

*	Happy to inform you we have successfully negotiated a reduction in the annual premium and our best offer is AED 184,000 + 5% VAT.

 

*	Additionally, we have negotiated an alternative option 2 with increased policy sum insured to AED 3,700,000 each and every loss and in the aggregate and for this option insurers will require an annual premium of AED 233,000 + 5% VAT.   Please note retroactive date will be from inception in respect of any increased limits.

chunks.text:
*	Additionally, we have negotiated an alternative option 2 with increased policy sum insured to AED 3,700,000 each and every loss and in the aggregate and for this option insurers will require an annual premium of AED 233,000 + 5% VAT.   Please note retroactive date will be from inception in respect of any increased limits. 

 

*	We have also persuaded Reinsurers to include a 5% Long Term Agreement Discount which means provided this policy is maintained through insurers/Nasco for three whole years commencing inception hereon, the Insured is able to reduce the renewal premium by 5% hereon. For the sake of good order, if for any reason the Long-Term Agreement is not maintained for the full three-year period, any allowed discount will be returnable to insurers.

 

*	Provided there are no known or reported losses in the remainder of the policy period and provided the renewal is obtained with insurers hereon, the Insured is eligible to collect their No Claims Bonus.  This is calculated at 10% of the expiring premium, and this amount can be deducted from the renewal premium when making payment. 

 

Please note the subjectivities in quotation are due to insurers prior to binding. 

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale

Dear Hagop,

 

Good Morning , hope you are doing well !

 

As part of our constant efforts to improve the scope of policy, we advise that you should have impersonation fraud extension in your policy.

 

This is also called executive impersonation, attackers impersonate an executive–typically a CFO or CEO or even vendors and request a fraudulently payment / sensitive data. 

 

Kindly fill in attached questionnaire and share with us enabling us to take this up with cover holders.

 

Reinsurers may be able to offer this coverage subject to a satisfactorily completed application form. This coverage is usually sub-limited and with an additional premium.

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope you are doing good !

 

We are pleased to offer our renewal terms based on proposal form submitted, noting the following:

 

*	Happy to inform you we have successfully negotiated a reduction in the annual premium and our best offer is AED 184,000 + 5% VAT.

 

*	Additionally, we have negotiated an alternative option 2 with increased policy sum insured to AED 3,700,000 each and every loss and in the aggregate and for this option insurers will require an annual premium of AED 233,000 + 5% VAT.   Please note retroactive date will be from inception in respect of any increased limits. 

 

*	We have also persuaded Reinsurers to include a 5% Long Term Agreement Discount which means provided this policy is maintained through insurers/Nasco for three whole years commencing inception hereon, the Insured is able to reduce the renewal premium by 5% hereon. For the sake of good order, if for any reason the Long-Term Agreement is not maintained for the full three-year period, any allowed discount will be returnable to insurers.

Dear Hagop,

 

Good Morning !

 

We are pleased to confirm coverage for the renewal period from 21st October 2024 to 22nd October 2025 for the expiring sum insured.

 

We have negotiated an extension to the deadline to receive your response on below subjectivities within 7 days of inception;

 

SUBJECTIVITIES:  

 

1. Confirmation no material changes declaration including confirmation of no known or reported losses as at date of inception. 

 

2. Confirmation no assets/liabilities/locations/employees in Russia/Belarus/Ukraine, and none expected during the next 12 months, otherwise Territorial Restriction Clause to apply in respect of Russia/Belarus/Ukraine. 

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

We are pleased to offer our renewal terms based on proposal form submitted, noting the following:

 

*	Happy to inform you we have successfully negotiated a reduction in the annual premium and our best offer is AED 184,000 + 5% VAT.

 

*	Additionally, we have negotiated an alternative option 2 with increased policy sum insured to AED 3,700,000 each and every loss and in the aggregate and for this option insurers will require an annual premium of AED 233,000 + 5% VAT.   Please note retroactive date will be from inception in respect of any increased limits. 

 

*	We have also persuaded Reinsurers to include a 5% Long Term Agreement Discount which means provided this policy is maintained through insurers/Nasco for three whole years commencing inception hereon, the Insured is able to reduce the renewal premium by 5% hereon. For the sake of good order, if for any reason the Long-Term Agreement is not maintained for the full three-year period, any allowed discount will be returnable to insurers.

 

*	Provided there are no known or reported losses in the remainder of the policy period and provided the renewal is obtained with insurers hereon, the Insured is eligible to collect their No Claims Bonus.  This is calculated at 10% of the expiring premium, and this amount can be deducted from the renewal premium when making payment. 

 

Please note the subjectivities in quotation are due to insurers prior to binding. 

 

Look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

 

Uttam Khutale
Technical Manager – Agency

 



 

Nasco Gulf

P.O. Box 26590, Dubai, UAE
